SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class AbstractDao<T extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InterestDao, LabDao, LogDao, MailDao, MessageDao, NoteDao, NotificationDao, ProjectDao, ProjectResourceDao, ResourceDao, ResourceSupplierDao, SessionDao, SkillDao, SupplierDao, SystemDao, TaskDao, UserDao, UserProjectDao, UserTaskDao
public abstract class AbstractDao<T extends Serializable> extends Object implements Serializable
AbstractDao is a generic class that provides common database operations. This class is annotated with @TransactionAttribute to specify that all methods require a transaction.
